comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@bingbing8**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution!

It looks like you're a Microsoft contributor (Yanbing Wang). If you're full-time, we DON'T require a Contribution License Agreement. If you are a vendor, please DO sign the electronic Contribution License Agreement. It will take 2 minutes and there's no faxing! https://cla.microsoft.com.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: bingbing8
comments.body: @lzybkr I removed a lot of white spaces and blank lines. Please review. Thanks!

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @lzybkr @bingbing8 7 tests failed in master after this PR was merged.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: The failing tests are in PackageManagement, this PR added unrelated tests, so it's most likely an external factor that caused those tests to fail.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: I will re-trigger the build on master

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Actually, nevermind, it was a daily build. So the failures are expected.
